services.name: Janitorial Service
services.shortDescription: Professional commercial cleaning for offices, shops, warehouses, and corporate facilities.
services.fullDescription: Our professional janitorial services provide comprehensive cleaning solutions for commercial properties throughout Massachusetts. From daily office cleaning to weekly maintenance, we keep your business environment spotless and professional.
features: Daily, weekly, or monthly cleaning schedules
benefits: Make great first impressions on clients
Reduce sick days with proper sanitization
Extend the life of your facility

faqs.question: How often should janitorial services be scheduled?
faqs.answer: The frequency depends on your facility size, foot traffic, and business type. Most offices benefit from daily or 2-3 times weekly service. We offer flexible scheduling to meet your specific needs.

faqs.question: What does commercial janitorial service include?
faqs.answer: Our janitorial services include floor cleaning, restroom sanitization, trash removal, dusting, window cleaning, break room cleaning, and general facility maintenance. We customize our services to your requirements.

faqs.question: Do you provide after-hours cleaning?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer flexible scheduling including early morning, evening, and weekend cleaning to minimize disruption to your business operations.

services.name: Deep Cleaning
services.shortDescription: Thorough top-to-bottom cleaning that reaches every corner of your home or business.
services.fullDescription: Our deep cleaning service goes beyond regular cleaning to tackle built-up grime, hidden dirt, and hard-to-reach areas. Perfect for move-ins, move-outs, seasonal cleaning, or when your space needs extra attention.
features: Kitchen deep clean including inside cabinets
Light fixtures and ceiling fan cleaning
benefits: Restore your space to like-new condition

faqs.question: What's the difference between regular cleaning and deep cleaning?
faqs.answer: Deep cleaning is more intensive and thorough. It includes cleaning areas often missed in regular cleaning like inside cabinets, behind appliances, baseboards, and detailed scrubbing of bathrooms and kitchens.

faqs.question: How long does a deep cleaning take?
faqs.answer: Deep cleaning typically takes 4-8 hours depending on the size of your home or business and its current condition. Larger spaces or very dirty areas may require additional time.

faqs.question: How often should I schedule a deep cleaning?
faqs.answer: We recommend deep cleaning 2-4 times per year as a supplement to regular cleaning services. It's also ideal before holidays, special events, or when moving.

services.name: Upholstery Cleaning
services.shortDescription: Expert cleaning for sofas, chairs, and all upholstered furniture to restore fabrics and remove stains.
services.fullDescription: Our professional upholstery cleaning service revitalizes your furniture, removing deep-set stains, odors, and allergens. We use safe, effective methods suitable for all fabric types to extend the life of your upholstered pieces.

faqs.question: How long does it take for upholstery to dry?
faqs.answer: Most upholstery dries within 4-6 hours depending on fabric type, humidity, and airflow. We use methods that minimize drying time while maximizing cleaning effectiveness.

faqs.question: Can you clean all types of fabric?
faqs.answer: Yes, we're trained to clean all fabric types including cotton, microfiber, leather, velvet, and delicate fabrics. We assess each piece and use the appropriate cleaning method.

faqs.question: Will cleaning remove all stains?
faqs.answer: We can remove most stains, but some set-in or old stains may be difficult or impossible to fully remove. We'll assess your furniture and provide realistic expectations before cleaning.

services.name: Carpet Cleaning
services.shortDescription: Professional carpet cleaning using advanced steam and dry cleaning methods for spotless results.
services.fullDescription: Our professional carpet cleaning service uses industry-leading equipment and techniques to deep clean your carpets. We remove dirt, stains, odors, and allergens, leaving your carpets fresh, clean, and extending their lifespan.

faqs.question: How long does carpet cleaning take?
faqs.answer: A typical home takes 1-3 hours depending on size and condition. Commercial spaces vary based on square footage. We provide time estimates during your quote.

faqs.question: How long until carpets are dry?
faqs.answer: Carpets typically dry within 6-12 hours. Factors like humidity, ventilation, and carpet thickness affect drying time. We recommend avoiding heavy foot traffic until fully dry.

faqs.question: How often should carpets be professionally cleaned?
faqs.answer: We recommend professional carpet cleaning every 12-18 months for residential carpets. High-traffic areas or homes with pets may benefit from more frequent cleaning.

services.name: General Housekeeping
services.shortDescription: Comprehensive home cleaning services to keep your living space fresh, clean, and comfortable.
services.fullDescription: Our general housekeeping services provide regular, reliable cleaning to maintain your home's cleanliness and comfort. From weekly tidying to bi-weekly deep cleans, we customize our service to fit your lifestyle and needs.
benefits: More free time for family and hobbies

faqs.question: What's included in housekeeping service?
faqs.answer: Our standard housekeeping includes dusting, vacuuming, mopping, kitchen cleaning, bathroom cleaning, bedroom tidying, and trash removal. We can customize services to include additional tasks like laundry or organizing.

faqs.question: How often should I schedule housekeeping?
faqs.answer: Most clients benefit from weekly or bi-weekly service. The ideal frequency depends on your household size, lifestyle, and personal preferences. We offer flexible scheduling options.

faqs.question: Do you bring cleaning supplies?
faqs.answer: Yes, we bring all necessary cleaning supplies and equipment. If you have preferences for specific products or have eco-friendly requirements, we're happy to accommodate.
